All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityAndFragmentTest
    This Test class is used to test Starting Screen fragment(s) navigation.
    AddCommentFragment
    This class represent the Add Comment Dialog.It prompts for the user's comment.
    CameraActivity
    This class defines the camera activity
    CameraFragment
    This class defines the camera screen
    Comment
    This class defines the comments of QR Codes
    CommentAdapter
    This class defines the adapter for displaying the comment
    CommentTest
    This class tests class Comment
    CommentViewHolder
    This class defines the view holder for the comment
    CreateAccountFragment
    This fragment represents the Create Account Screen.
    EditProfileFragment
    This class defines the edit fragment screen
    EditQRFragment
    This class represents the Edit QR Screen and displays the hashed QR name, QR score, and QR geo-locations (if any).
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    HighestScoreRank
    This class stores the item information in the leaderboard for the highest QR Code score
    HighestScoreRankTest
    This class tests class HighestScoreRank
    History
    This class defines users' past, compact QR Codes
    HistoryAdapter
    This class defines the adapter for displaying the QR Code history.
    HistoryTest
    This class tests class History
    HistoryViewHolder
    This class defines the view holder for QR Code
    Info
    This class defines QR Codes in relation with players
    InfoTest
    This class tests class Info
    LeaderboardActivity
    This class represents the Leaderboard Screen of the app.
    LeaderboardAdapter
    This class defines the adapter for displaying the leaderboard.
    LeaderboardFragment
    This class represents a leaderboard screen.
    LeaderboardRepository
    This class defines the repository for the leaderboard activity
    LeaderboardViewHolder
    This class defines the view holder for the leaderboard
    LeaderboardViewModel
    This class defines the view model for the leaderboard activity
    MainActivity
    This class represents the main screen of the app.
    MainFragment
    This class defines the main screen
    MainRepository
    This class defines the repository for the main activity
    MainViewModel
    This class defines the view model for the main activity
    Player
    This class defines players
    PlayerAdapter
    This class defines the adapter for displaying the player
    PlayerTest
    This class tests class Player
    PlayerViewHolder
    This class defines the view holder for the player
    ProfileFragment
    This class defines the profile screen
    PromptLocationFragment
    This class represents the Prompt Location Screen and gets the geo-location of the scanned QR code.
    PromptPictureFragment
    This class represents the Prompt Picture Screen and navigates the user back to the Camera Screen if the user wants to.
    QRCode
    This class defines QR Codes
    QRCodeTest
    This class tests class QRCodeo
    QRDetectedFragment
    This class represents the QR Detected Screen.
    QRDisplayActivity
    This Activity is used to host fragment navigation.
    QRDisplayFragment
    This class represents the QR Display Screen.
    QRDisplayRepository
    This class defines the repository for displaying comment(s)
    QRDisplayViewModel
    This class defines the view model for displaying comment(s)
    QRQuestGlideModule
    This class defines the connection to bind image to be displayed with the corresponding image stored on Google Storage
    Rank
    This class defines the ranking of players
    RankTest
    This class tests class Rank
    RegionalHighestScoreRank
    This class stores the item information in the leaderboard for the regional highest QR Code score
    RegionalHighestScoreRankTest
    This class tests class RegionalHighestScoreRank
    ScannedNumberRank
    This class stores the item information in the leaderboard for the most scanned QR Codes
    ScannedNumberRankTest
    This class tests class ScannedNumberRank
    SearchActivity
    This class represents the search screens of the app
    SearchAdapter
    This class defines the adapter for displaying the search
    SearchFragment
    This class defines the search screen
    SearchRepository
    This class defines the repository for the search activity
    SearchViewHolder
    This class defines the view holder for the search
    SearchViewModel
    This class defines the view model for the search activity
    StartActivity
    This Activity is used to host fragment navigation.
    StartFragment
    This fragment represents the Start Screen.
    TotalScoreRank
    This class stores the item information in the leaderboard for the highest total score
    TotalScoreRankTest
    This class tests class TotalScoreRank
    Utilities
    This class consists of different functions that are utilised in the project.
    UtilitiesTest
    This class tests class Utilities
    VPAdapter
    This class defines the adapter for the view pager item
    VPAdapter.ViewHolder
    This class defines the view holder of the view pager item
    VPItem
    This class defines the view pager item
